subject: Re: [Request received] Oncobeta - Treatment page updates
preview: This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.  If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation th

full_threads.body:
This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough: 
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5
  • https://www.loom.com/share/b1f338d04eb44b118d915b107a6ed087?sid=1dbc4938-b676-4cd2-a748-5692874039dc

##- Please type your reply above this line -##

Hello WolfIQ Support,

We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below:

https://support.combinate.me/requests/30450/satisfaction/new/Pdv2dyLIr2eSDDA2KKjf4Bj5a?locale=1176

Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about:

----------------------------------------------

Alyssa Venturanza, 5 Jun 2025, 11:10 GMT+10

Hi Glen,

You can disregard our last email, the client advised they'll make the change.

We can now close our ticket, thanks!

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

----------------------------------------------

Alyssa Venturanza, 5 Jun 2025, 11:01 GMT+10

Hi Glen,

Thanks for that. Just one final thing, can we also change the format of the address? Please push the suburb and state/post code down one line.

For reference, let's follow the format below:

> Ground Floor, Proxima Building,
> 22 Frazer Street
>
> Southport, QLD 4215
> Australia

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

----------------------------------------------

WolfIQ Support, 5 Jun 2025, 10:18 GMT+10

Hi, Alyssa

Done. Updated to place 'QLD' on the same line as 'Southport'.

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.



Thanks,

**Glen Tenorio**
support@wolfiq.com.au

![wolfiq.com.au](https://lh3.google.com/u/0/d/1m3NYUuXtUVyZ313zB6byGDnpd4zEEcb2=w3024-h1646-iv2)
**Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google!**

Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:

- Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
- Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
- Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. **_Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request._**

Alyssa
